original_title: YES SHE CAN - Frauen ver√§ndern die Welt
overview: Equality does not automatically mean equal opportunities - this still applies to working women in Germany today. YES SHE CAN - WOMEN CHANGE THE WORLD showcases women who are not satisfied with this status quo. Role models who inspire. Experts who demonstrate how gender equality can finally be put into practice from theory.
title: YES SHE CAN - Women Change The World
